Tripltek T93 Trial Siden du bruker en Tripltek T93 har 30 dagers gratis utprøving. Hvis du har en DMD2 lisens, vennligst legg inn denne. Fortsett utprøving Legg inn lisens Avslutt utprøving DMD2-lisens:

Varslinger Tillat varslinger som pop-up Viser varslinger fra apper du tillater Hvordan fjerne varslinger:
Timeout etter 5s
Timeout etter 10s
Timeout etter 15s
Timeout etter 30s
Timeout etter 60s
Manuelt
Fjernkontroll fokus på varsling Når en varsling er synlig vil fjernkontrollen fokusere på den, trykk på Enter for å åpne appen varslingen kom fra, eller tilbake for å lukke varslingen App filter Velg hvilke apper du vil skal vise varslinger Vis kun siste varsling i hver gruppe Hvis aktiv vil du kun se den siste varslingen for hver gruppe, f.eks den siste meldingen. Vis varslinger for: Alle / Ingen Lukk

OEM Registrering Registreringsprosess (krever internet) Brukes kun hvis motorsykkelen ble levert fra fabrikk med en androidenhet hvor DMD2 var forhåndsinstallert.
Informasjon og lenker DMD2 Versjon Installert versjon: Lær mer om DMD2 på den offisielle nettsiden DMD2 utvikles av Denne versjonen av DMD2 er optimalisert for Tripltek-enheter Besøk og følg vår Facebook-side for å få de siste nyhetene Meld deg inn i facebook-gruppe delta i diskusjoner om nye funksjoner, feil og forslag Lisensnøkler Prøveversjon / DMD2 Versjon Håndter prøveversjon og legg inn lisensnøkkel
Velkommen til DMD2 DMD2 vil gjøre din androidenhet til et komplett dashboard for motorsykler, ATVer og biler med fokus på adventure og off-road. DMD2 inneholder kart for navigasjon, Roadbook, OBD2 integrasjon og mye mer. Start
GPS Innstillinger Senk GPS nøyaktighetsfilter For enheter med sub-optimal GPS kvalitet
Innstillinger for enheter uten Google PlayStore Deaktiver CARPE Controller App sjekk Dette stopper overvåkning av controller-appen og vil ikke lengre spørre etter installasjon eller oppdatering. CARPE Controller funnet! Det ser ut til at du bruker en CARPE Controller, vil du installere CARPE controller APP?
Lagring Lagring på SD-kort For offline kart og brukerfiler. SD Card mangler! Tidligere brukt SD-kort mangler, vennligst sett det inn igjen! Prøv igjen Bruk internminne Annet SD-kort! Det ser ut til at du har skiftet ut SD-kortet, vil du bruke dette? Hvis ikke; vennligst sett inn det andre kortet! Ny kontroll av SD-kort SD-kort mangler fotsatt! Flytte kartfiler? Vil du flytte kartfilene fra internminnet til SD-kort? Dette kan feile hvis det ikke er nok plass! il du flytte kartfilene fra SD-kortet til internminnet? Dette kan feile hvis det ikke er nok plass! Flytter filer, vennligst vent! Ikke lukk DMD2 eller bytt til annen skjerm eller program!
TRIP Trip Statistics View real-time values about your ride, information like distance, total time, travel time, stop time and average speed. APPS App Shortcuts Set quick access app shortcuts to launch your favorite apps. Select App Shortcut or Clear Slot Clear Slot OBD RPM OBD RPM Indicator An OBD based RPM bar with a clean design, includes red line color change and numeric indicator. HEADING GPS Heading A graphical indicator for your current heading based on GPS data, includes the numeric degree value. MEDIA Media Player Control Allows you to control your active media session, includes album artwork and track and artist name (requires notifications access permission). NAV Map View Your map view with all the loaded content and active states, does not include map controls and can only be loaded on the left panel. SPEED GPS Speed A big numeric speed value showing your current travel speed based on GPS data. INFO GPS & OBD Indicators User selectable values from OBD sensors and GPS data. NOTIFICATIONS Notifications List A list of your currently active notifications. No notifications yet EXTERNAL WIDGET System Widget Load Android system widgets from your installed apps. CLOCK A Big Clock Just a simple big digital clock, in case time is crucial for you. PROGRESS Map Nav Progress Shows navigation instructions or GPX track progress depending on the active state between the two. Select Widget
Left Panel Right Panel Center Top Center Bottom Change Widget
Distance Total Time Travel Time Stop Time Avg Speed
Select GPS/OBD Sensor GPS Altitude Altitude GPS Heading Heading GPS Speed Speed Trip Max Speed Max Speed Trip Distance Trip Total Time Trip Travel Time Trip Stop Time Trip Avg Speed OBD Speed RPM Coolant Voltage Fuel Throttle Spark MAP IAT MAF Invisible Reset AdvCtrl Voltage
Media Control Permission Media Control Widget requires access to notifications to read media player content like title, artist, album name and artwork. Do you want to allow this permission?
Trip Reset Are you sure you want to reset the trip statistics?
Notifications Pop-Up Do you want DMD2 to access notifications to show you a pop-up for any new notification? You can configure for which apps you want to see the pop-up in the Settings > Notifications.
New Notifications Left/Right - Dismiss
Favorite Apps Apps Filter Enable apps filter Hides the apps set in the app filter list Sorting Select how to sort the app shortcuts
App Name - Alphabetical
App Developer Name - Alphabetical
By Install Date
By Last Updated
Sorting Direction
Ascending
Descending
Set hidden apps Click here to set which apps to hide or show Select Apps to Hide Available actions for this app: Uninstall Hide Cancel
OBD Preferences OBD Bluetooth Device Setup Select which OBD Protocol to use OBD Protocol Reader Config Commands Commands to configure bluetooth reader, separate with new line Choose Paired OBD Device Select from paired bluetooth devices. Make sure dongle is paired first! Select ELM327 Bluetooth Device Get Voltage from Dongle Use STVR command for voltage reading instead of ECU PID Fuel Level Settings Calculate fuel level If your level is not reported by the ECU you can let DMD2 calculate it based on average mileage per tank. To reset press the fuel icon when you fill up. Fuel Tank Average Mileage What is your average mileage with a full tank Speed and RPM Options GPS Speed Value Source Use GPS/Terrain Wheel Sensor instead of OBD Speed value (which might not be available) Set Maximum RPM Set your vehicle maximum RPM value Set redline RPM Set your redline RPM value Throttle Options Use RAW Throttle Position value Use actual OBD2 raw value or calibrate minimum and maximum positions Calibrate Throttle Position This will start a dialog with instructions for throttle minimum/maximum position calibration. Requires the ECU to be ON and OBD dongle connected, the engine should be off. This will NOT change any value in your ECU!
COOLANT Coolant Temperature VOLTAGE Voltage THROTTLE Throttle Position FUEL Fuel Level SPARK Spark Advance IAT Intake Temperature MAF Mass Air Flow MAP Mass Air Pressure
Select OBD Sensor Set a new OBD Sensor for this slot
Minimum Throttle Position Calibration PLEASE TURN ON THE ENGINE! Make sure vehicle is at stable post warm-up idle!!! Your throttle should be at the minimum position (at idle / totally off). Press the Set button when ready. Set Minimum Maximum Throttle Position Calibration PLEASE TURN OFF THE ENGINE! Make sure ignition is ON and then push your throttle position to the maximum position (full open throttle). Press the Set button when ready. Set Maximum Please Connect to the OBD Dongle First!
Fuel Level Options Reset fuel level if you just filled your tank or manually edit the remaining fuel distance. Reset Edit Set Remaining Fuel Distance Set remaining distance Error: value cannot be higher than tank capacity or lower than 1 Error not a valid distance number!
No DTC Errors DTC Errors Reset Errors Error Options Ignore Error: Error: You are not connected to the ECU!
OBD Monitor Service Running Connected to dongle! Disconnected from dongle!
OBD2 Demo Mode Demo mode is limited to 15 minutes per session. Buy the OBD Plugin to unlock! Buy Plugin
Instruments Settings Total Distance - Single Decimal Place Will show the Total distance with a single decimal place instead of two Partial - Single Decimal Place Will show the Partial distance with a single decimal place instead of two Visual Settings Invert PDF Colors Inverts the paper color, might be useful for riding during the night. Lock Settings Lock also disables paper touch When lock is enabled the paper touch is ignored, useful to prevent accidental movements or rain drop actions. Lock also disables instruments When lock is enabled the instruments tap actions will also be disabled. Lock also disables top menu When lock is enabled the top menu will also be disabled, only the lock button will work. Sync lock with play/pause Locking will also trigger play and unlocking will trigger pause. Adjustments Distance Multiplier Add a correction factor to Total and Partial distance (in case you need to match to Roadbook distances) Hide Instruments Panel If you have your own dedicated instruments and just want to use the PDF roll. Reset Session Unloads current PDF file and resets all statistics and distances. Confirm Reset Are you sure you want to reset the current progress? This unloads current PDF file and resets all statistics and distances! Reset Remote Controller Setup

Set Repeat Speed for Joystick Set Repeat Speed for Buttons

Nothing to save! Maybe start by opening a new Roadbook File. Replace or Add New Overwrite the current sessions or add a new entry? Overwrite New Entry Session Name Already Exists A session with this name already exists, do you want to replace or edit the name? Replace Edit Name

Date: PDF File: Total Distance: Total Time: Travel Time: Average Speed: Load Rename Location Edit this session name This session name is already taken, please type something else. ERROR: The PDF file for this session does not exist anymore! Session Load Confirmation Are you sure you want to load this session? Any unsaved Roadbook progress will be lost!
Roadbook Demo Mode Demo mode is limited to 15 minutes per session. Buy the Roadbook Plugin to unlock! Buy Plugin License Purchase Your device does not have Play Store installed, you can still purchase a key in our website and then insert it to activate it! Insert Key Purchase Please insert your license key to activate the plugin: Activate Error Activating License Wrong license code or already activated on another device, check licenses in your Thork Racing account page or contact support. License Activated Plugin is now active! Thank your for your support.
No Maps Downloaded Yet It seems you have not yet downloaded any map file, do you want to do it now? Starting Layers Manager! Select Navigation Mode Use DMD2 to calculate the route or use an external app? Use DMD2 External App Panning Mode Enabled
Map Layers Base Map Source Base data for terrain, roads, buildings, addresses, and elevation. 3D Buildings Converts building areas into basic extruded 3D shapes Map Labels & Symbols Base map labels & symbols settings Enable Layer Enable Labels Labels Scale Enable Symbols Symbols Scale Enable Shadowssd Download Maps Select Maps to Load Error: The map files are missing, please download them again! No downloaded maps yet, click Download Maps to download! Select Region Select Country Downloaded: Last Update: Size: Region: File Name: Load Map: No Update DMD2 Downloading Please wait for the download to complete! Cannot connect to server, try again later! Not enough storage space! POI Icon Highlight Set POI icons to show at lower zoom levels (500m zoom max)(fuel/hospital/peaks are always enabled). Restaurant Cafe Pub Cafe & Pub Hotel Hostel Accommodation Camping Supermarket Attraction View Point Historic Natural Parking Place Car Repair Monument ATM Bank Gas Station Motorcycle Repair Map Type & Style Select the default minimal and clean map type or a more detailed off-road topographic type. Also set the light and dark color modes. Default Minimal Off-Road Topo Light / Dark Mode: Light Dark Theme Sensor Topo Advanced Options Fine tune the Off-road Topographic map type Show Altitude Lines Unpaved Highlight (visible at low zoom) Show Motorways Show Primary Roads Show Secondary Roads All settings have been reset to defaults! HillShading (online) Shows the topographical shape of hills and mountains using shading Transparency
GPX Manager Load File No file loaded. Press Load File. Tracks Waypoints Center Map GPX Settings Show or Hide Show or hide GPX elements (for all files), takes priority over individual file settings. Show All Enabled GPX Tracks Show Track Direction Arrows Show All Enabled Waypoints Show Waypoint Title Text Hide Waypoints on Low Zoom Sizes & Transparency Set GPX elements default sizes & transparency Color Defaults Track line default color and color overwrites Track Line Width Track Transparency Direction Arrow Size Waypoint Pin Size Hide All Show All Delete All Default track color (when no color is specified or set by the user): Overwrite all colors set in files to default color: Overwrite all colors set by the user to default color: Auto Load POIs Automatically load POI along the track up to 3 categories Enable auto POI load along the track: Select POI categories to load: The selected GPX file does not contain any track! Distance from track start You need to be riding on the same GPX file Waiting for GPS Fix Select app to share Loading track POI search, this might take some time… Advanced Options Invert Travel Direction Attempt to convert full file to navigation: If GPX includes off-road tracks please use MIXED profile!\nLow (Fast): Faster calculation, but may deviate from the original GPX.\nHigh (Slow): Slower calculation, specially on big files, but will deviate less.\nNOTICE: Big GPX files (above 1000Km), even on fast mode, can take forever… Low (Fast) High (Slow) This GPX file does now contain any track!

Map Demo Mode Demo mode is limited to 15 minutes per session. Buy the Map Plugin to unlock! Buy Plugin Map Plugin Purchase Select subscription duration. 12 Month Subscription Lifetime Purchase 6 Month Subscription 12 Month 6 Month Lifetime This option is only available for licensed users!
Auto Zoom & Tilt Enable auto-zoom level Enable auto-tilt level Auto mode only in active navigation Interface Options Enable track progress info box Will show a box on the left side of the screen with track progress and distances to next POIs and Waypoints. Disable map touch when locked Specially useful if you have a controller, disables the whole screen touch Map Language Map Language

Navigation Navigate To: Ask to use DMD2 or External If enabled, DMD2 will ask if you want to use DMD2 or another app, if disabled it defaults to DMD2. Controller Settings Disable Panning Mode Target Disables the new panning mode target spot actions
